Name: S3NotificationConfigurationTopicConfiguration
Documentation: Describes the topic and events for the Amazon S3 NotificationConfiguration property.

Parameters.Name: Event
Parameters.Documentation: The Amazon Simple Storage Service (Amazon S3) bucket event about which to send notifications. For more information, see Supported Event Types in the Amazon Simple Storage Service Developer Guide.

Parameters.Name: Filter
Parameters.Documentation: The filtering rules that determine for which objects to send notifications. For example, you can create a filter so that Amazon Simple Storage Service (Amazon S3) sends notifications only when image files with a .jpg extension are added to the bucket.

Parameters.Name: Topic
Parameters.Documentation: The Amazon SNS topic Amazon Resource Name (ARN) to which Amazon S3 reports the specified events.
